question: He told me Talaaq thrice and apologized after
answer:
QUESTION

Sir, my husband and i argued one month ago, he was so angry theat he said just said talaaq, talaaq, talaaq, but after few hours he soon got back to me and said sorry to me .does this talaaq happened.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

The three talaqs are valid. They constitute a talaq-e-mughallazah (permanently irrevocable divorce). You are no more husband and wife. You should separate from him and observe the laws of iddat.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
